description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget representing the delivery history screen in a healthy meal ordering app. It includes a main screen class, along with internal widgets for the header and list rows, all composing a UI with styled headers and placeholders for delivery history details.

classes.name: DeliveryHistoryScreen
classes.description: Main widget for displaying delivery history with header and list items.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: Header widget with styled background, icon, and title.

classes.name: _Row
classes.description: Reusable widget for displaying individual list items with icon and text.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the main DeliveryHistoryScreen widget with app bar and list view.

methods.name: _Header.build
methods.description: Builds the styled header container with gradient, icon, and title.

methods.name: _Row.build
methods.description: Builds a container with icon and text for list items.
